item.title: Launch of teic.ie
item.description: Today marks the launch of technology news and reviews site teic.ie, which has to be one of the best site names we’ve seen!Â It’s written by Adam Maguire who is one of the finest technology and business journalists in the country. Adam’s reviews are in-depth and extremely knowledgeable. The use of a blog format means he should quickly see a community forming around the site and there is no reason we won’t have a European Gizmodo or Engadget on our hands.
